alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 10:07AM CST until February 25 at 6:51AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .The Ohio River at Shawneetown is expected to rise above flood stage later today, on its way to a crest of 34.3 feet Thursday morning. For the Ohio River...including Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly bottomland and surrounding low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 32.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 34.3 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
